summary: Skooma Inc. wished to introduce SUPER SKOOMA! Making regular SKOOMA the SKOOMA it should have been! BENEFICIAL! CRAFTABLE! ADDICTIVE! SSSKOOOOOOOMAAA!!!
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]SKOOMA![/u][/b] Everyone loves Skooma...or they would if it wasn\'t the watered down stuff we get in Skyrim.

[size=6][b][u]Skooma Inc. is proud to present our all new product line! See below for all the new products and changes![/u][/b][/size]

Skooma Inc. Skooma is like regular Skooma except [u]WAY BETTER[/u]! [b]SKOOMA!!![/b]


Skooma Inc. Skooma changes the regular crappy Skooma into something worth using, choosing and abusing!

[b][u]THE FACTS[/u][/b]:

- Skooma now has BENEFICIAL PROPERTIES!
- Skooma now has NEGATIVE EFFECTS!
- Skooma now has VISUAL EFFECTS!
- Skooma is now ADDICTIVE!
- Skooma is now CRAFTABLE!
- Skooma is now TOTALLY AWESOME!

[b][u]UPDATE DETAILS[/u][/b]:

Skooma Inc. is proud to welcome Ri\'samat to the Skooma Inc. family! Ri\'samat is Skooma Inc.\'s new [u]wandering representative[/u] in Skyrim. You\'ll See Ri\'samat travelling around with one of the Khajiit merchant caravans selling Skooma Inc. products! Be quick because supplies are limited and are going fast!

Along with our new reprisentative we have introduced a [u]whole new range[/u] of delicious Skooma for your enjoyment! Each of our wonderful products has been carefully crafted to ensure you get the best Skooma money can buy! But with better Skooma comes a price, addiction is now harsher than ever before, so either carry lots of Skooma on you or make sure you can get your hands on some [u]Skooma Detox Solution[/u] from Ri\'samat!

We would also like to mention our brand new recipe for [b][u]Balmora Blue[/u]![/b] Unfortunately, due to the rarity of it\'s crafting components, and the complexity of it\'s brewing, we\'re keeping it\'s recipe under lock and key. If you wish to aquire some of our delicious Balmora Blue, keep an eye out for Ri\'samat and hope he\'s got some in stock! (SEE BELOW for full product line and product changes!)

So what are you waiting for? Get out there and dose yourself up to the eyeballs with Skooma! You haven\'t lived until you\'ve tried it! SSSKOOOOOOOOOOOOMAAAAAA!!!!!!


[u]Skooma Inc. - Skyrim\'s finest Skooma since 4E 201[/u]

[b][u]FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH ALL MODS THAT DON\'T CHANGE SKOOMA OR BALMORA BLUE![/u][/b]


[b][u]The Products and Changes[/u][/b]

[b][u]Skooma Addiction[/u][/b]
- All Skills: -10
- Stamina Regeneration: -75%
- Magicka Regeneration: -75%
- Health Regeneration: -100%

[b][u]Skooma Detox Solution[/u][/b]
- Removes Skooma and Skooma Addiction: effects.

Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 50+
Ingredients: 2 Nirnroot, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Mammoth Tusk


[b][u]Skoomanade[/u][/b]
- Weapon Damage: +5%
- Destruction Damage: +10%
- Speed +10%
- Speech -10

Duration: 5mins
Chance of Addiction: 10%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 20+
Ingredients: 2 Dragons Tongue, 1 Moon Sugar, 2 Monarch Butterfly Wings


[b][u]Skooma[/u][/b]
- Weapon Damage: +20%
- Destruction Damage: +50%
- Stamina and Magicka Regeneration: +5/sec
- Speed +50%
- Speech -30

Duration: 3mins
Chance of Addiction: 20%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 30+
Ingredients: 3 Nightshade, 2 Moon Sugar, 1 Luna Moth Wing


[b][u]Speed Shot[/u][/b]
- Speed +300%
- Damage Taken +300%

Duration: 30secs
Chance of Addiction: 5%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 25+
Ingredients: 1 Nightshade, 1 Moon Sugar, 2 Sabrecat Fangs


[b][u]Slow Joe Skooma[/u][/b]
- Slow Time
- Speed +20%
- Magicka regeneration: -100%
- Stamina regeneration: -100%
- Stamina and Magicka: -2/sec

Chance of Addiction: 10%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 30
Ingredients: 2 Moon Sugar, 2 Orange Dragonfly, 3 Alto Wine


[b][u]Tuff Stuff[/u][/b]
- Health +10/sec
- Damage: Taken -75%
- Damage: Dealt -100%

Duration: 15secs
Chance of Addiction: 30%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 40
Ingredients: 1 Dragon Scale, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Briar Heart


[b][u]Big Mans Bluff[/u][/b]
- Increase Player Size
- Weapon Damage: +15%
- Destruction Damage: +25%
- Speech +50
- Speed -30%
- Stamina Regeneration: -100%
- Magicka Regeneration: -100%

Duration: 3mins
Chance of Addiction: 20%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 40
Ingredients: 1 Nightshade, 1 Moon Sugar, 2 Giants Toe, 1 Mammoth Snout


[b][u]Skooma Spark[/u][/b]
- Weapon Damage: +15%
- Destruction Damage: +25%
- Speed +20%
- Lightning/Flame/Frost Cloak
- Speech -30

Duration: 3mins
Chance of Addiction: 20%
Crafting Requirement: Alchemy 50
Ingredients 2 Dragons Tongue, 1 Moon Sugar, 1 Void Salts, 1 Fire Salts, 1 Frost Salts


[b][u]Balmora Blue[/u][/b]
- Weapon Damage: +50%
- Destruction Damage: +70%
- Stamina and Magicka Regeneration: +10/sec
- Speed +100%
- Speech -100

Duration: 3mins
Chance of Addiction: 50%
Crafting Requirement: -N/A-
Ingredients: -N/A-


[b][u]Known Issues[/u]:[/b]
There is a known issue whereby speed effects may not occur until you start to sprint. No known fix at this point in time.
author: Cabrio AKA dragonagelogin
